critique: This document is an amendment regarding an exception to examination requirements for an assistant in the Department of Agriculture. It seems to be a minor administrative change. It's difficult to assess a strong political bias based on this document alone. The changes seem to be related to internal operations and staffing within the Department of Agriculture. There is no clear indication of a shift in ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores will be neutral.
